dcterms:description: The left atrium (LA) dataset consists of 923 anonymized Late Gadolinium Enhancement (LGE) MRIs from distinct patients, manually segmented by cardiovascular medicine experts. Post-segmentation, the images were cropped around the region of interest.
dcterms:title: LGE MRI Left Atrium Dataset

dcterms:description: The AbdomenCT-1K liver dataset includes 1132 3D CT scans and their corresponding liver segmentations. After visual quality assessment, 833 samples were selected for experiments, which were aligned and cropped around the region of interest.
dcterms:title: Abdomen CT-1K Liver Dataset
